item.title: Zoom Stock Time Series Analysis
item.description: Utilized Python libraries (pandas, numpy, scikit-learn) on 3 years of Zoom stock prices from Yahoo Finance. Built time series forecasting models (Facebook Prophet and Holt-Winters) to predict future stock prices. Achieved an accurate model (22% MAPE over a 120-day future forecast) which plays a critical role in reflecting overall stock market trends and seasonality. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Finding Value in NFTs
item.description: Performed text analytics in Python on 20 random NFT whitepapers using Natural Language Processing. Created a Latent Dirichlet Allocation model to visualize and analyze distinct NFT topics. Supported claim of value in NFTs that provide utility using custom KPIs. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Gaming Anxiety Big Data Analysis
item.description: Analyzed 13,000 surveys from an online gaming community for signs of increased anxiety over the pandemic. Utilized Big Data tools such as machine learning and ensemble modeling (Gradient Boosted Trees) run on an AWS EMR Cluster in Pyspark. Identified potential issues in general anxiety, life satisfaction, and social anxiety levels in increased gaming. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Data Mining for Mental Health Awareness
item.description: Applied preprocessing and Exploratory Data Analysis methods (PCA, Feature Selection) in Python on 28,000 untidy records of suicide rates among socio-economic factors across the globe. Visualized data using seaborn (boxplots and heatmaps) and built a multivariate regression model. Underlined the drastic consequences of poor mental health in the world with visualizations and analytics, using insights to combat this issue with better informed decisions. Link to GitHub Repository
